resources.string: This application will include different phrases to motivate de user. It will have different Bible verses and famous phrases about motivation. The goal of this app is to make the user like some motivational phrases. So there will be a button to "like" the phrase, and that phrase will be saved in another activity, so the user can go back and see their favorite phrases. Also it will have another button that can let the user save the phrase, as a picture, in their camera roll. The user will be able to scroll down and to see more phrases, they can scroll up to see the previous phrase too.

As said before, they will be Bible verses and famous phrases, so the user can choose between this two options and look through the different types of phrases. The goal is to show motivational phrases and the user to be able to see all the phrases they liked and to choose from a category in specific.

Health E will be an app aimed at gamers seeking to become more healthy. The app will begin with a fitness test to gauge fitness level. The more you workout , the higher your fitness level becomes. The app is designed to ease the less athletically inclined to keeping a regular workout schedule/habits.This will consist of mostly simple body weight workouts that can be done at home. There is a lot of room for expansion of including features to help eating habits and sleep.
This app creates a route using Google Maps based on a distance the user would like to run!
